job_tasks.phrase: Write tools and services in Go and Python
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the development of software tools and services, which falls under traditional software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Administer Kafka clusters that play a central role for data exchange in the company
job_tasks.justification: Administering Kafka clusters for data exchange is an operational task related to managing data infrastructure, aligning with the 'Operations' aspect of MLOps/LLMOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Set up and maintain third party tools in Kubernetes that are used for data visualization, discovery and lineage
job_tasks.justification: Setting up and maintaining tools in Kubernetes is a core infrastructure and operations task, fitting the 'Operations' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitoring in Prometheus and Grafana - you build and set up solutions that make sure our systems are operating smoothly
job_tasks.justification: Building and setting up monitoring solutions using Prometheus and Grafana is a direct responsibility within the 'Operations' domain.

job_tasks.phrase: Help improve our CI/CD framework for reliable builds and deployments
job_tasks.justification: Improving CI/CD frameworks is a key aspect of DevOps and MLOps, falling under the 'Operations' category.

job_tasks.phrase: The main goal of the Data Platform is to combine different data sources, internal and external, and make them available to our stakeholders company-wide: Developers, Product Development, Data Science and Management.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the overarching business goal and how the data platform serves various stakeholders, indicating an understanding of business needs.

job_tasks.phrase: We provide support at all stages of the data lifecycle to ensure that users can access the data they need to make data-driven decisions and to provide a framework for high data quality and transparent data security.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the purpose of the platform in enabling data-driven decisions and ensuring data quality/security, which relates to business strategy and understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Diverse and internationally distributed team: joining our team means becoming part of a large, global community with people of more than 90 nationalities.
job_tasks.justification: This describes working within a diverse, international team, implying a need for strong collaboration and communication skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Open communication, regular feedback: as a language-focused company, we value the importance of clear, honest communication. We value smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback, and believe that leading with empathy makes us better together.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions valuing open communication, collaboration, and feedback.

job_tasks.phrase: Annual learning budget: because we never stop learning, we've set up an annual budget for your professional development-pick a learning path which contributes to your career development and we'll back you up.
job_tasks.justification: The mention of a learning budget and the statement 'because we never stop learning' directly points to a focus on continuous learning and professional development.

job_tasks.phrase: Monthly full-day hacking sessions: every month, we have Hack Fridays, where you can spend your time diving into a project you're passionate about and get the opportunity to work with other teams-we value your initiatives, impact, and creativity.
job_tasks.justification: Hack Fridays encourage initiative, passion, and creativity, aligning with the 'Innovation & Ownership' category.

soft_skills.phrase: Diverse and internationally distributed team: joining our team means becoming part of a large, global community with people of more than 90 nationalities.
soft_skills.justification: Working in a diverse, international team necessitates strong communication and collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Open communication, regular feedback: as a language-focused company, we value the importance of clear, honest communication. We value smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback, and believe that leading with empathy makes us better together.
soft_skills.justification: The ad explicitly states the value placed on open communication, collaboration, and feedback.

soft_skills.phrase: Annual learning budget: because we never stop learning, we've set up an annual budget for your professional development-pick a learning path which contributes to your career development and we'll back you up.
soft_skills.justification: The provision of a learning budget and the emphasis on continuous learning highlight the importance of this skill.

soft_skills.phrase: Monthly full-day hacking sessions: every month, we have Hack Fridays, where you can spend your time diving into a project you're passionate about and get the opportunity to work with other teams-we value your initiatives, impact, and creativity.
soft_skills.justification: Hack Fridays encourage initiative, passion, and creativity, which are key aspects of innovation and ownership.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses heavily on infrastructure, operations, and software development tasks (Macro-Category A), specifically mentioning administering Kafka, setting up tools in Kubernetes, monitoring with Prometheus/Grafana, improving CI/CD, and writing tools in Go and Python. There are no tasks related to AI model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG (Macro-Category B). Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the responsibilities, which are squarely in the domain of infrastructure and software engineering. There is no mention of AI/ML specific tasks, making the classification unambiguous.
